name: Fly on It
description:
A game I built for the 2020 Brackeys game jam!

Click S to skip a level and R to restart it.

You play as a rectangle who loves his cube and must make it to the end.

Music credits go to Joseph Mohan, and you can check out some more of his pieces at josephmohanmusic.com

I had a ton of fun making it and I hope you enjoy playing it!
